        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ENABLE_NO_PORTFOLIO_OPEN

        public static final java.lang.Integer ENABLE_NO_PORTFOLIO_OPEN
        Components Enabled value. Enable components for when the program is running, but no portfolio is currently open.

      • ENABLE_NO_STOCK_LOADED

        public static final java.lang.Integer ENABLE_NO_STOCK_LOADED
        Components Enabled value. Enable components for when portfolio is open, but no stock has been loaded into the main display.

      • ENABLE_LOOKUP_STOCK_LOADED

        public static final java.lang.Integer ENABLE_LOOKUP_STOCK_LOADED
        Components Enabled value. Enable components for when portfolio is open and a "lookup" stock is loaded into the main display. A "lookup" stock is one whose values are being viewed, but no shares of it are currently owned in the portfolio.

      • ENABLE_OWNED_STOCK_LOADED

        public static final java.lang.Integer ENABLE_OWNED_STOCK_LOADED
        Components Enabled value. Enable components for when portfolio is open and an "owned" stock is loaded into the main display. An "owned" stock has at least one share owned in the portfolio.

      • ENABLE_REFRESH_PORTFOLIO

        public static final int ENABLE_REFRESH_PORTFOLIO
        Components Enabled value. Enable components for when portfolio is open and currently being refreshed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PORTFOLIO_NAME_DIALOG

        public static final java.lang.Integer PORTFOLIO_NAME_DIALOG

        public static final java.lang.Integer OPEN_PORTFOLIO_DIALOG
